ygData.subject: Faction notes for Dark elves
ygData.msgSnippet: I confirmed that Orcs in Crushbone Castle do not effect Neriak factions. I know a few people argued this point, and I finally got back to check it out.  I
ygData.messageBody:
I confirmed that Orcs in Crushbone Castle do not effect Neriak factions.

I know a few people argued this point, and I finally got back to check it out. I killed the Prophet, Emperor Crush, emissaries, orcales and legionaires in Crush castle without one negative faction adjustment to the Indigo Brotherhood.

Just wanted to settle that old argument.

Bael,
Warrior of the Indigo Brotherhood
Rogue hunter of blue orcs
